newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: EEI takes 10 pct stake in 600-ha estate.
newsitem.headline: EEI takes 10 pct stake in 600-ha estate.

text.p: Construction firm EEI Corp said on Wednesday it had taken a 10 percent stake in a group which plans to develop a 600-hectare plot northern Philippines into a town.

The company told the Philippine Stock Exchange that it had signed a shareholders' agreement with Seafront Resources Corp and six other local companies to develop a part of Hermosa town in Bataan, just north of Manila, into an industrial estate, residential community, golf and country club and a commercial centre.
The group will have an authorised capital of one billion pesos.
